EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Dealer Update #19.2019 Dealer Update #19
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins Update - September 23, 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletins | September 2019
Laseref IV Upgrade
- This Honeywell Sales Bulletin provides special pricing for the installation of the Laseref IV to replace the Laseref II and Laseref III which are expected to be unrepairable in 2020. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-06 Rev C <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-06-Rev-C-Laseref-IV-Upgrade-for-Business-Aircraft-FINAL-REV-C.pdf]]> for Honeywell dealers. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-06 Rev A for OEM Service Centers <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-06-OEM-Rev-A-Laseref-IV-Upgrade-for-Business-Aircraft-FINAL-REV-A.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/JI2qQ00VCX0ZNE00G000000]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
